features: [ PEPTIDE COMPLEX ] Help reduced the look of fine lines and wrinkles while supporting skin elasticity

[ OVERNIGHT MOISTURIZER ] Helps soften, hydrate and retain skin's moisture with hyaluronic acid. Renew the look of tired skin overnight. This skin care product does not come with a protection inner seal.
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Fragrance free, non-comedogenic, and non-irritating formula

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream is formulated with biomimetic peptides, hyaluronic acid, and three essential ceramides that work together to lock in skins moisture an help restore you skin's protective barrier overnight. Wake up to skin that looks refreshed and renewed. This non-greasy, intensely moisturizing skin renewing night cream is designed to soften and renew the look of tired skin.•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Gentle, non-irritating formula Key Ingredients:•Biomimetic Peptides: Improve the appearance of tired-looking skin•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rich, Hydrating Night Cream CeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream has a rich, velvety texture. Once applied, it is absorbed quickly and leaves skin with a smooth, hydrated, non-greasy feel. How to Use When layering products like serums or eye creams, apply a thin layer and allow product to be absorbed fully before applying CeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream. Apply in small dots where needed around the face and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Niacinamide Helps to calm skin. Free of Fragrance to Avoid Irritation All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. As fragrance in skincare products can irritate sensitive skin, all CeraVe products are formulated without fragrance.

Hydrating Facial Cleanser Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum Skin Renewing Day Cream SPF 30 Skin Type Normal to Very Dry Skin All Skin Types Healthy-Aging Skin Benefits Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier 10% pure Vitamin C to help visibly brighten and even skintone while providing antioxidant benefits Formulated with encapsulated retinol, clinically shown non-irritating. Texture Non-Foaming, creamy texture Gel-cream texture Smooth, hydrating texture

Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Cleanser Skin Renewing Nightly Exfoliating Treatment Skin Renewing Night Cream Skin Type Normal to Dry Skin Healthy-Aging Skin Healthy-Aging Skin Benefit Cleanses, hydrates, and removes makeup without disrupting the skin's protective barrier Exfoliates to help smooth fine lines and reveal radiant skin, without flaking. Helps refresh the look of tired skin overnight with ceramides. Texture Cream-to-foam texture Lightweight, gel texture Smooth, hydrating texture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than I thought but so moisturizing I think I can make it last. It's pricey but the ingredients are really great. Hoping I can use this sparingly enough to keep purchasing this. I just wish I got more in the jar tbh. But it is really really effective and not irritating at all. It's not greasy and for how thick it is it absorbs super fast into the skin. Maybe because of the hyloronic acid?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based on a recommendation by a dermatologist. This was a budget buy due to its price point. I have dry, mature fair skin. I am really particular with the creams I put on my face. I can tell in 5 minutes if something is going to be hydrating enough for my skin. This Cera Ve cream is a winner when it comes to moisturizing and hydrating your skin. It also has working benefits in it like peptide complex , niacinamide and ceramides. These all work for your skin. It is very hydrating, so I use it mainly at night. It has no fragrant smell. It does its job and is a good night cream. You will feel the difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not greasy and soothing. Goes a long way!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very soothing face cream. I also like the fact that it doesn't have a smell since I am sensitive to smells. It feels very refreshing to my face. It doesn't take much, either, so it will last a long time! It isn't too thick and isn't greasy. I am 47 and have tried different face creams and this is my favorite now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for really dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I mix this with my Sunday Riley night serum, and it works really well to keep my super dry skin moisturized. However, it's such a tiny jar. I'm used to this brand giving huge quantities for a small price, so it's surprising. But...I keep buying because it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smooth to your skin
reviews.reviewText: it feels light weight and fresh doesn't leave your skin oily. Your it gives your face that moist fresh skin for nights. doesn't have a smell to it. the bottle i smaller then what expected but other then that i recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new holy grail moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new moisturizer with simple ingredients but strong enough to fight skin dryness from starting retinol. I have sensitive skin, redness, acne prone, super oily but also super dry. This stuff is amazing! I use it morning and night now while my skin is in the peeling stage with retinol. I don't feel any burning on application which sometimes happens with my sensitive skin. It doesn't have any scent in my opinion. It's very thick so a little goes a long way but it moisturizes sooo well. It definitely leaves a residue but it doesn't interfere with makeup application for me and most people would probably only use it as a night cream anyway. Worth the price, would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thick. Very hydrating. Rubs in nicely and doesn’t leave a greasy residue. Wish the container was larger for the price. Pretty expensive for such a small container. You do have to use a larger amount cover the entire face, due to the thickness but overall I like the cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is great for dryer skin, especially in the winter. It's thick and feels nice when applying. Has no scent, which I prefer, and makes for a great everyday staple.
Very good night cream , it is very pricey though
Deja la piel super hidratada y mejora la textura al poco tiempo de usarla. De las mejores cremas que he probado.

I've jumped on the bandwagon and wouldn't go back. Works perfectly for my sensitive skin and surprisingly lasts a long time. I use it at night for the extra moisture (even in the humid Aussie climate) and would highly recommend it.
I use it for my eyes and face. My must have all-rounder. Been using for a few years now. Highly recommend 👍
This is my dream facial cream every winter.
